content:
Hi Everybody,

I'm looking for patient data.

I've tested the servers I found on the webpage and in the shared spreadsheet (full results are attached).

Do you have a server with Patient data that is not on the list?

Do you have a server with Patient data that is on the list but I was not able to get data from?

Is there a better place to ask this question?

Thanks,
John

SERVERS WITH PATIENT DATA

http://fhir3.healthintersections.com.au/open
Got 50 Patient records
http://wildfhir.aegis.net/fhir1-8-0
Got 55 Patient records
http://measure.eval.kanvix.com/cql-measure-processor/baseDstu3
Got 5 Patient records
https://api3.hspconsortium.org/fhirconnect14/open
Got 10 Patient records
http://10.199.175.251:7080/CentricityPracticeFHIRServer/fhir/
Got 20 Patient records
question.txt

Hi Everybody,

I'm looking for patient data.

I've tested the servers I found on the webpage and in the shared spreadsheet (results are shown below).

Do you have a server with Patient data that is not on the list?

Do you have a server with Patient data that is on the list but I was not able to get data from?

Is there a better place to ask this question?

Thanks,
John

question.txt

@John Gresh , you can get patient data from the T-System server by using the Patient route.
https://fhirsandbox1.tsysinteropsvcs.net:8100/sites/123/Patient
There are over a million patient records with data at https://syntheticmass.mitre.org/fhir/metadata
synethicmass.mitre.orgâ€™s server DNS address could not be found.

Try something like https://syntheticmass.mitre.org/fhir/Patient?address-city=Newton

I don't think we have an index on name. I'll submit an issue request for that.
You can search it... doesn't mean the DB is indexed correctly. :)
